TopicTitle: My first look & playthrough of KSP 2

Articles.Content:
I'd like to begin by saying that I'm happy that I got the game after 3 years and happy to give my feedback to devs & KSP community so we can all make this game super awesome in the end.   

Down Below I'll give KSP 2 a report card on my first playthrough of KSP 2 then I'll give an explanation on why I gave that area a grade I well as give my ideas at the end

Graphics A+
Performance  C-
Flying B-
Building A+

Graphics

In terms of graphics besides the performance even on low settings the graphics look amazing mainly including the main KSC I also love the sparks & water system on the launch pad as too like great as well I also love the look of the Mun and the other planets new looks.  

Performance

Even with minimum specs for my pc KSP 2 ran well in only when I was in the VAB and Tracking Station. It also frustrated me when I launched a rocket and got huge drop in frames when looking down at KSC my frames would go from 25 FPS down to 10 FPS when looking at the KSC. For KSP 2 to succeed in getting people Build, Fly,  Dream Performance must be enhanced as soon as possible in the next update to the game.  

Flying

Flying my space craft was super fun however my rockets where very wobbly which caused  a lot of problems for me and as for the kraken I was lucky enough not to come across it in my game play but as play more I know it well come for my kerbal crew.  

Building

Building is even better then KSP 1 with procedural wings and flat graphic of a rocket building & more in KSP 2 has never been better !  

 

Ideas 

Here are some of ideas to add to KSP 2 in future updates

 

Robotic Parts from KSP 1 with new parts 

Deployable Surface futures from KSP 1 with new parts

MORE BOOSTERS ! 

more  solar and energy options to power my craft and space stations

More rover parts

More crew and space station parts

 * Increased Performance ( FOCUS ON THIS PLEASE )

More Star Systems to explore

Crossplay with multiplayer  ( Please add this I beg of you )

Just picking your graphics rating - have you played any new game in the last 10 years? Have you ever played KSP1 with mods that improve graphics especially planets? A+ seems way over the top.

 

That for example is probably top notch modern graphics - that would be my A+:

Yay I have to agree with on that I may have been a little bit overboard but I mainly gave it that rating because I just barely meet the requirements with my pc and yes I have played ksp 1 with mods
